item.title: Random Walk Home
item.description: $\ldots$ you decide to go for a walk and start from home. You are in a playful mood and decide to only take random left turns every now and then. You do the following: You roll a dice, get number $x$, and walk $x$ hundred meters straight ahead. You turn left. You repeat the process. What’s your (maximum) chance that after, let’s say, 4 dice rolls you end up home again?
